alert.note: Alert for Fayette (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 11 at 6:01PM CDT until June 11 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN FAYETTE...NORTHERN HARDEMAN...SOUTHEASTERN HAYWOOD AND SOUTHWESTERN MADISON COUNTIES... At 600 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Hillville, or 11 miles southeast of Brownsville, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Bolivar, Chickasaw State Forest, Whiteville, Hillville, Dancyville, Cloverport, Mercer, Toone, Medon, Fayette Corners, Cedar Chapel, Vildo, Hickory Point, Hatchie, Uptonville, Teague, Shandy and Morton Hill. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
